player_news.trend_summary: Erling Haaland has committed his long-term future to Manchester City, signing a remarkable 10-year contract that is reportedly one of the most lucrative in sports history. The Norwegian striker, who joined City from Borussia Dortmund in the summer of 2022, has been in sensational form for the Premier League champions, scoring 32 goals in 31 appearances across all competitions.

player_news.player_name: Omar Khaled Mohamed Abd Elsala Marmoush
player_news.trend_summary: Amidst speculation of a transfer to Manchester City, Omar Marmoush was notably omitted from Eintracht Frankfurt's squad for their victory over Borussia Dortmund in the Bundesliga. The Egyptian winger's departure from Frankfurt seems imminent, with sources claiming that details of his contract with the Premier League giants have been finalized.

player_news.trend_summary: In a crucial Bundesliga clash, Oscar Højlund's impressive performance for Eintracht Frankfurt against Borussia Dortmund was a key factor in their 2-0 victory, further deepening Dortmund's ongoing crisis. Højlund's goal, alongside Ekitike's, piled more misery on Dortmund, marking their third consecutive defeat.

player_news.trend_summary: Aston Villa defender Diego Carlos is reportedly close to joining Turkish club Fenerbahce, with talks between the clubs progressing. Villa manager Unai Emery has confirmed that the club is in discussions to sell Carlos, who has been linked with a move away from the Premier League side. The Brazilian center-back has been a key figure for Villa since joining in 2022, but could now be set for a new challenge in Turkey.

player_news.trend_summary: In a thrilling Copa del Rey match, 16-year-old Endrick became the youngest player to score a brace in the competition's history, firing Real Madrid into the quarterfinals with two extra-time goals against Celta Vigo. The Brazilian prodigy dedicated his goals to teammate Antonio Rüdiger, who he credited with providing invaluable support on and off the pitch.
